description: M5Stack has launched the M5Stack LLM Module, an advanced offline large language model inference module designed for terminal devices requiring efficient, cloud-independent AI processing. This product is described as targeting offline applications such as smart homes, voice assistants, and industrial control. The AX630C SoC appears to include dual-core Arm A53 processors clocked at 1.2GHz, along […]
title: M5Stack Introduces LLM Module for Offline AI Applications
